metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5881 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash component infrastructure in YUI 2.4.0 through 2.9.0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to charts.swf, a similar issue to CVE-2010-4207.

notes.Note: jdstrand> maas uses an embedded copy of yui 3.4.1 in 12.04 and portions of yui3 in 12.10 and higher per upstream, yui3 not affected

criterions.comment: yui: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
